TopicTitle: Odd issue with LES and actrion groups

Articles.Content:
Not sure what could cause this (Though I imagine it has to be one of my mods), but when activated via action groups, the LES' engines cease to function. I can activate the engine and it'll say its running, but no fuel will be used and no thrust generated. But interestingly enough, if activated via staging (even after attempting to use action groups) then the engine actually works.

I noticed that this happens with the stock LES and FASA's LES'. Haven't tried to see if it does it with other parts.
